channel.title: 317 - RevolutionX - BattleScape PK
channel.description:
[u]Developers[/u] - - - - -
I will only accept 5 developers. If the server gets bigger during the development I will recruit more. If you are more skilled than other developer, I will take you instead.
[u]If you want to apply, use this format.[/u]
[code]Name: Age: Why you want to join?: Experience in coding?: What do you code? Source? Client? Or Both?: Proof of experience: How I can contact you:[/code]
[u]What I want for this server:[/u] Green = Done Yellow = In Progress Red = Not Started
-Vengeance -Full Combat (Range + Mage + Melee) -Multi Barrage -Full Pest Control -Full Jad -Full fight pits -Full Godsword Stances -Full Godsword Specials -Defenders Like Runescape -Godsword Dismantle + Rebuild -Anchor Stance -Anchor Special -Duel Arena 95%+ -Castle Wars -Barrows with tunnel -Melee following -Range following -Magic following -Working Obilisks -Multi-Log fix (1 Connection Per IP) -X-Log fix -Rune Knives -Full Clan Chat (CUSTOM) -Anti Null -Anti SYI -Anti Dupe -Skilling good as Combat -Runescape music in every city/town

item.title: 317 - RevolutionX - BattleScape PK
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

Name: Tim

Age: 15

Why you want to join?: I Love Coding 317’s

Experience in coding?: About 3 - 3 1/2 Years Of 317

What do you code? Source? Client? Or Both?: Source

Proof of experience: Idk? I’ve got heaps of source’s, Never released (I FAIL AT PORTFORWARDING)
I Was Sozzol-Scape Coder Before Rebounder Was A LITTLE 11 YEAR OLD WHORE, Sorry, had a moment.

How I can contact you: xx_holy-timmah_xx@hotmail.com

~ Cheers Tim

item.title: 317 - RevolutionX - BattleScape PK
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_So_Cool Java Is So Cool
item.description:
@Java_Is_So_Cool wrote:

Developers

I will only accept 5 developers. If the server gets bigger during the development I will recruit more. If you are more skilled than other developer, I will take you instead.

If you want to apply, use this format.

Name: Age: Why you want to join?: Experience in coding?: What do you code? Source? Client? Or Both?: Proof of experience: How I can contact you:

What I want for this server:
Green = Done
Yellow = In Progress
Red = Not Started

-Vengeance
-Full Combat (Range + Mage + Melee)
-Multi Barrage
-Full Pest Control
-Full Jad
-Full fight pits
-Full Godsword Stances
-Full Godsword Specials
-Defenders Like Runescape
-Godsword Dismantle + Rebuild
-Anchor Stance
-Anchor Special
-Duel Arena 95%+
-Castle Wars
-Barrows with tunnel
-Melee following
-Range following
-Magic following
-Working Obilisks
-Multi-Log fix (1 Connection Per IP)
-X-Log fix
-Rune Knives
-Full Clan Chat (CUSTOM)
-Anti Null
-Anti SYI
-Anti Dupe
-Skilling good as Combat
-Runescape music in every city/town
